strings.string: Jeu d'énigme
Cette pierre semble pouvoir se briser.
Allez ! On utilise EclatRock !
Allez ! On utilise Force !
Mais il semble manquer un objet...
Cette pierre semble pouvoir se déplacer.
Vous avez obtenu :
Cette pierre semble reliée à un signal, peut-être qu'en trouvant comment l'activer on peut la passer
Il parait que si tu as compris le sens de la vie, alors tu pourras passer
On dit qu'il faut savoir ce que l'on cherche pour pouvoir passer...le sais-tu ? Parce que moi pas vraiment...
Mew...mew, mew mew !
Hello I'm Alejandro. I'm in charge of all your damange upgrades. Don't listen to Tota, he's an idiot.
Hello I'm Tota. I'm in charge of all your health upgrades, that is if you can afford my services...
ALEJANDRO, WHAT ARE YOU DOING!!! I TOLD YOU TO CLEAN THIS ROOM, EVEYTHING IS A MESS
WHAT DO YOU MEAN, YOU TOLD ME NOT TO TOUCH ANY OF YOUR "PRECIOUS BELONGINGS"
Ah ouai, t'as raison...
ALEJANDRO, HOW MANY TIMES DID I TELL YOU NOT TO TOUCH MY PRECIOUS BELONGINGS!!!! YOU RUINED EVERYTHING.
YOU LITERALLY TOLD ME TO CLEAN UP SINCE "EVERYTHING IS A MESS"
hmmm... I don't remember
Would you like to upgrade your health ?
Would you like to upgrade your damage ?
It looks like you don't have enough coins
Be careful of poison, it can damage you even after getting hit
This land used to be very peaceful until He showed up...
I always hear Tota and Alejandro fighting, they sound like an old married couple
Be careful when exploring the dungeons, if your health ever gets low, try consumig cherries and hearts, I heard they help
